result.execSummary:
The defendant Zachary A. Anderson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Zachary A. Anderson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Zachary A. Anderson was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Court's response to DOC letter.  In 16CF7 and 16CF11 amend jail report date for the 14 days conditional jail to be September 21, 2016 at 6:00 p.m.

Defendant Zachary A. Anderson not in court.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Notice of hearing was mailled to defendant at address of record.  Court attempted to reach Probation Agent.  State requests warrant.  Court modifies probation to release community service, add 14 days conditional jail com. 7/15 @ 6:00 p.m.; revoke DPA 15CF50 and authorize warrant.
Probation review hearing on June 20, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Zachary A. Anderson
Current: 111 S Main St, c/o Eagles Nest Group Home, Granton, WI 54436 United States  (Effective: 05-16-2016)
Prior: 716 E. Prospect Street, Durand, WI 54736
Probation review hearing on May 16, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Probation review hearing on April 25, 2016 at 03:30 pm.

Buffalo-Pepin Counties CJCC Termination of C/S.  Buffalo-Pepin Counties CJCC Termination of C/S for failure to comply with the program.  The defendant has not completed the assigned community service.

Defendant Zachary A. Anderson in court with attorney S. Joseph Randtke.  Defendant Zachary A. Anderson in custody.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Agreement reached.  Defendant will plead to count 1 in 15CF50 DPA; count 2 in 16CF11 and count 3 in 16CF07; 2 yrs probation on 2 misdemeanors w/jail; State w/draws motion to revoke bond in 15CF50; all other counts and cases will be dismissed.   Court advises defendant of charge in count 2 in 16CF11, defendant pleads guilty; advised of charge in count 3 of 16CF07, defendant pleads guilty; advised of charge in count 1 of 15CF50, defendant pleads guilty.  Plea colloquy.  Court finds defendant's waiver of his constitutional rights and pleas done K&V, accepts plea in 16CF11 & 16CF07 and finds defendant guilty; court defers acceptance of plea in 15CF50 and approves DPA; court withholds sentence & places defendant on 2 yrs. probation on 2 misdemeanors with conditions.  Advised of appeal rights.

Defendant Zachary A. Anderson in court, in custody.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court confirms defendant received copy of criminal complaint, advises of charges/max. penalties and rights including right to preliminary hearing within 10 days if in custody, 20 days if not.  State requests $1000 cash bond.  Court sets bond at $1000 cash, informs the defendant to contact the SPD Office.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for February 16, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
